In England, in the seven days to 06 May, there were 12,129 new confirmed cases (21.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 29 April, there were 13,031 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 7% (902 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 11 May is 3,878,541 (6,890.7 cases per 100,000 population).
